verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
E
Christian hearts in love united
Seek alone in Jesus rest
Has he not your love excited

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Then let love inspire each breast
Members on our Head depending

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Lights reflecting Him our Sun
Brethren His commands attending
We in Him our Lord are one

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Come then come O flock of
Jesus covenant with Him anew
Unto Him who conquered for us

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
Pledge we love and
Service true
And should our love's union
Holy firmly linked no more

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines:
Remain wait ye at His
Footstool lowly till
He draw it close again

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Grant Lord that with
Thy direction love each
Other we comply

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Aiming with unfeigned affection
Thy love to exemplify
Let our mutual love

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines:
Be glowing thus will
All men plainly see
That we as on one stem growing
Living branches are in Thee

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O that such may be our union
As Thine with The Fathers is
And not one of our communion

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
E'er forsake the path of bliss
May our light shine forth with
Brightness from Thy light
Reflected shine

verse.name: v4c
verse.lines:
Thus the world will bear
Us witness that we
Lord are truly Thine
